plot: Maxwell is a yesman to his wife until, one day, one last straw breaks the camel's back. Maxwell decides to get rid of Darling. But he is not much of an action man.
title: Yes Darling
plot_es: Maxwell is a yesman to his wife until, one day, one last straw breaks the camel's back. Maxwell decides to get rid of Darling. But he is not much of an action man.
plot_en: Maxwell is a yesman to his wife until, one day, one last straw breaks the camel's back. Maxwell decides to get rid of Darling. But he is not much of an action man.
